1525710.name: Defuse
1525710.description:
Defuse is an intense tactical shooter that tests your strategy, coordination and reflexes. Immerse yourself in action-packed matches where every decision counts: from selecting your equipment and planning routes to executing precise attacks against well-equipped enemies. Each confrontation presents dynamic objectives that require communication and teamwork, making coordination with your squad as important as your aim.

Master varied maps full of strategic angles, hiding places and attack routes, and adapt your playing style to each situation. With an extensive arsenal of weapons and tactical equipment, each match offers new opportunities to demonstrate your skills and overcome your opponents.

Can you stay calm under pressure, make quick decisions and lead your team to victory? In Defuse strategy and action define every encounter, offering a tactical shooter experience that challenges both your mind and your reflexes.
1525710.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语
